articles.title: Elon Musk's Daughter Torches Him As Fake Christian, Bigot And 'Serial Adulterer'

articles.content:
Elon Musks estranged daughter Vivian Wilson skewered her billionaire father on Monday as a liar, bigot and terrible person on a platform he doesnt own.
Wilson, 20, launched the thread after spotting… [+2385 chars]

articles.author: Nora Naughton
articles.title: GM and Ford's gas-powered profits are a problem for Tesla's EV slowdown
articles.description: Companies like GM and Ford can rely on hybrids and gas-powered cars to get through the EV slowdown. Tesla can't do that.
articles.content:
Tesla is finally being forced to reckon with a slowdown in electric-vehicle demand, and CEO Elon Musk's tactics are likely to look different than his peers' in the automotive industry.
Both Ford and… [+2634 chars]

articles.author: Ana Altchek
articles.title: Elon Musk is going 'hardcore' again at Tesla
articles.description: Elon Musk made it crystal clear he isn't messing around about the need for meaningful layoffs, a new report reveals.
articles.content:
Elon Musk wants there to be no doubt that Tesla needs to be "hardcore."
Musk reaffirmed the company's need for meaningful layoffs and cost-cutting in an email late Monday night, according to a repor… [+2489 chars]
